00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 bool AnalysisStream:: doAnalysis(               ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00038                                                 IntensityMart &iMart,
00039                                                 bool doReport,
00040                                                 bool alleleSummaryOnly) {
00041   bool success = true;
00042   if (m_QMethod->setUp(psGroup, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust)) {
00043     if (!alleleSummaryOnly) {
00044       m_QMethod->computeEstimate();
00045       if (doReport) {
00046         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00047           m_Reporters[i]->report(psGroup, *m_QMethod, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust);
00048         }
00049       }
00050     }
00051   }
00052   else {
00053     Verbose::out(5, "Warning setup failed for name: " + ToStr(psGroup.name));
00054     success = false;
00055   }
00056   if (!success && doReport) {
00057     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00058       m_Reporters[i]->reportFailure(psGroup, *m_QMethod, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust);
00059     }
00060   }
00061   return success;
00062 }
00063 
00064 /** 
00065  * Destructor.
00066  */
00067 AnalysisStream::~AnalysisStream() {
00068   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_CStreams.size(); i++) {
00069     Freez(m_CStreams[i]);
00070   }
00071   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_CSStages.size(); i++) {
00072     cleanupStage(i);
00073   }
00074   delete m_PmAdjust;
00075   delete m_QMethod;
00076   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00077     delete m_Reporters[i];
00078   }
00079 }

00081 /** 
00082  * Set the reporter for an analysis stream.
00083  *
00084  * @param outDir - directory to output things to.
00085  * @param precision - number of digits after decimal place.
00086  * @param doResiduals - output residual errors.
00087  * @param doFeatureEffects - output feature responses.
00088  */
00089 QuantMethodExprReport*
00090 AnalysisStream::addTextReporter(const std::string& outDir,
00091                                      int precision,
00092                                      bool doResiduals,
00093                                      bool doFeatureEffects) {
00094 
00095   return addTextReporter3(outDir,
00096                           precision,precision,precision,
00097                           doResiduals,
00098                           doFeatureEffects);
00099 }
00100 
00101 QuantMethodExprReport*
00102 AnalysisStream::addTextReporter3(const std::string& outDir,
00103                                  int precision_sum,
00104                                  int precision_feff,
00105                                  int precision_res,
00106                                  bool doResiduals,
00107                                  bool doFeatureEffects) {
00108 
00109   QuantMethodExprReport* qReport=new QuantMethodExprReport(m_Info.getNumCols());
00110   qReport->m_qMethod=m_QMethod;
00111   //
00112   qReport->setDirPath(outDir);
00113   qReport->setFilename("AddTextReporter-DEBUG"); // debugging not used
00114   qReport->setFileprefix(m_Name);
00115   qReport->setIsHeaderBuffer(1);
00116   //
00117   qReport->m_DoSummary=true;
00118   qReport->m_DoFeatureEffects=doFeatureEffects;
00119   qReport->m_DoResiduals=doResiduals;
00120   // overall precision
00121   qReport->setPrecision(precision_sum);
00122   // set the precisions for each of the reports
00123   qReport->m_summary_tsv_precision=precision_sum;
00124   qReport->m_feffects_tsv_precision=precision_feff;
00125   qReport->m_residuals_tsv_precision=precision_res;
00126   //
00127   qReport->setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
00128   //
00129   addReporter(qReport);
00130   //
00131   return qReport;
00132 }

00134 /**
00135  * Write out the initial text header for a quantification method.
00136  * 
00137  * @param execGuid - Job unique id.
00138  * @param timeStr - When job was run.
00139  * @param commandLine - Command line specified to program.
00140  * @param colNames - Names of columns (usually cel file names).
00141  * @param execVersion - Version, cvs id string.
00142  */
00143 void AnalysisStream::addStdHeaders(const std::string& execGuid, 
00144                                    const std::string& timeStr,
00145                                    const std::string& commandLine,
00146                                    // const std::vector<std::string> &colNames,
00147                                    const std::string& execVersion,
00148                                    const AnalysisInfo& info) {
00149   // printf("### AnalysisStream::addStdHeaders()\n"); // debug
00150   //
00151   string qMethodGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00152   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00153     QuantMethodReport *qReport = m_Reporters[i];
00154     qReport->addStdHeaders(qReport, 
00155                            execGuid,
00156                            qMethodGuid, 
00157                            timeStr,
00158                            commandLine,
00159                            // colNames,
00160                            execVersion, 
00161                            info);
00162   }
00163 }

00167  * 
00168  * @param layout - Chip information.
00169  * @param execGuid - Job unique id.

00171  * @param commandLine - Command line specified to program.
00172  * @param colNames - Names of columns (usually cel file names).
00173  * @param execVersion - Version, cvs id string.
00174  */

00176                                    const std::string& execGuid, 
00177                                    const std::string& timeStr,
00178                                    const std::string& commandLine,
00179                                    // const std::vector<std::string> &colNames,
00180                                    const std::string& execVersion,
00181                                    const AnalysisInfo &info) {
00182   // printf("### AnalysisStream::addStdHeaders()\n"); // debug
00183   //

00185   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {

00194   }
